amendment.description: Amendment encourages institutions of higher education to establish pregnant and parenting student services offices.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 109-399 to establishe and operate pregnant and parenting student services offices to assist students in locating and utilizing child care, family housing, flexible academic scheduling such as telecommuting programs and parenting classes and programs, and post-partum counseling and support groups.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hart amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
